title: 2-year-old shot in the face in Fort Pierce
content:
FORT PIERCE, Fla. —
A 2-year-old is in critical condition after being shot in the face in Fort Pierce near Avenue E late Monday night, police said.
When officers arrived, the child was already en route to a hospital. Rescue vehicles met the family halfway.
Police said multiple shots were fired. It is unclear whether the child was outside or in a house.
Police said there were several shootings Monday night. Investigators are trying to see of any are connected to the most recent investigation.
Stay with WPBF 25 News for more on this developing story.
